MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the FK2 postcode area of Falkirk affecting properties in Abercairney Crescent and surrounding areas. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, we are aware of the previous power cuts in your area and we apologise for this, however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to complete repairs on a faulty underground cable, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8.50pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:28 PM on Tuesday, 30 March 2021.
